name: FxStat
tag_list: forex, autotrading, forex-social-network, ea, fxstat, mirror-trading, money-manager, managed-account, fx, statement, trading-statement, track-record
overview:
FxStat is an innovating service for both experienced and novice forex traders, providing a wide range of new tools and information specifically meant to improve trading strategies and results.

A completely secure and transparent platform, FxStat allows investors to analyze tradersâ€™ strategies as well as their own performances, socialize and make new connections and get first-hand information about the forex market. With its latest launched automatic trade service, Tradebook, members have access to the first real-time auto-trading facility.

Through Tradebook, retail traders can set their accounts to follow the activity and automatically execute the trades of FxStat investors that have the best performance. Novices can achieve the same success advanced investors reach without any effort, while experienced traders can use the service as an alternative source of income. Members choose the traders they want to follow with the help of the widest range of tools that analyses strategies and results, while still enjoying complete control over their portfolio and investments. Connections between tradersâ€™ account and the FxStat platform are made easily and are completely secure, while signal providers accounts are approved only after a throughout verification of their trading and real account.

FxStat users are able to interact with each other through messages, chat or forum and have the widest range of tools that help them filter a long list of strategies and performances. They can use the statistics provided to check strategies, analyze each trade, create graphics to compare different indicators or check the risk strategies.

FxStat is the fastest growing service of its kind, expanding its offer of instruments and services with the help of team of experts in foreign currency trading and software development.

Fx Stat products and services are compatible with the MetaTrader 4 platform, widely used by several brokers. Also, FX STAT Ltd UK is regulated and authorized by The Financial Services Authority.
